metadata.name: Suspicious JavaScript Execution Via Mshta.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of javascript code using "mshta.exe".

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\mshta.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('mshta.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('javascript')))

output.summary: Detects execution of javascript code using "mshta.exe".
